naslov: Prodaja - Samostojeća kuća 400 m2 + okućnica - Vrapče, Borčec (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Samostojeća kuća 400 m2 + okućnica - Vrapče, Borčec Prodajemo prekrasnu samostojeću kuću na parceli površine 1632 m2 u Borčecu. Kuća se nalazi u mirnom dijelu Zagreba, okružena zelenilom. U blizini cca 100 m je autobusna stanica (zet), a škola, vrtić, ambulanta i trgovina su udaljeni 5 min autom. Kuća se prostire na 4 etaže: podrum s garažom i kotlovnicom cca 54 m2, prizemlje, prvi kat i roh bau tavan. Glavni dio kuće je izgrađen 1980. godine, dok je nadogradnja bila 2010., kao i adaptacija postojećeg - nov krov, crijep, toplinska fasada, instalacije struje i vode. Površina kuće iznosi 400 BRP s pripadajućom okućnicom od 1425 m2. U prizemlju se nalaze 3 spavaće sobe, kupaonica, ostava, vešeraj i hodnik. Također se nalazi garaža, zaseban WC, spremište i parkirna mjesta. Na katu se nalazi dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom, rustikalna kuhinja, balkon, kupaonica, smočnica i natkrivena terasa s pečenjarom površine 70 m2. Na kat se iz prizemlja dolazi unutarnjim ili vanjskim stepeništem, obzirom kuća ima dva zasebna ulaza. Tavanski prostor nije uređen. Kuća ima kotlovnicu sa sustavom za centralno grijanje na lož ulje ili drva. Postoji mogućnost spajanja na plinsku mrežu. Na parceli je dozvoljena gradnja još jednog stambenog objekta. Vlasništvo 1/1, posjeduje sve dozvole. Sale - Detached House 400 m2 + Garden - Vrapče, Borčec We are selling a beautiful detached house on a plot of 1632 m2 in Borčec. The house is located in a quiet part of Zagreb, surrounded by greenery. Approximately 100 meters away is a bus stop (ZET), while the school, kindergarten, clinic, and shops are a 5-minute drive away. The house consists of 4 floors: a basement with a garage and boiler room of approximately 54 m2, ground floor, first floor, and rough attic. The main part of the house was built in 1980, while the extension was in 2010, along with the adaptation of the existing structure - new roof, tiles, thermal facade, electricity, and water installations. The surface area of the house is 400 square meters with an accompanying garden of 1425 m2. On the ground floor, there are 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, a pantry, a laundry room, and a hallway. There is also a garage, a separate toilet, a storage room, and parking spaces. On the first floor, there is a living room with a dining area, a rustic kitchen, a balcony, a bathroom, a pantry, and a covered terrace with a barbecue area of ​​70 m2. The first floor can be accessed from the ground floor via internal or external stairs, as the house has two separate entrances. The attic space is not furnished. The house has a boiler room with a central heating system powered by oil or wood. There is also the possibility of connecting to the gas network. Construction of another residential building is allowed on the plot. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Kotlovnica na kruta goriva
